subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|恒隠圏|こういんけん}}: the area on the globe in which a given star is never visible
* {{ja-r|恒温|こうおん}}: constant [[temperature]]; [[homoiothermic]], [[homoiothermal]]
* {{ja-r|恒温槽|こうおんそう}}: a [[temperature-controlled]] or [[thermostatic]] [[bath]], [[chamber]], or [[oven]]
* {{ja-r|恒温動物|こうおん どうぶつ}}: a [[homoiotherm]]
* {{ja-r|恒河|^こうが}}: the [[Ganges]] River
* {{ja-r|恒河沙|^こうがしゃ}}: all the sand on the banks of the [[Ganges]] River: an [[infinite]] amount
* {{ja-r|恒規|こうき}}: a [[rule]] or [[principle]] that must [[always]] be followed
* {{ja-r|恒儀|こうぎ}}: a [[custom]] or [[convention]]
* {{ja-r|恒久|こうきゅう}}: [[permanence]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is an alternative form of {{ja-l|常}} which is more common.
